text.ascii: vAsudeva uvAca
text.ur: vāsudeva uvāca

text.ascii: nedaM kRcchram anuprApto bhavAn syAd vasudhAdhipa
text.ur: nedaṁ kr̥cchram anuprāpto bhavān syād vasudhādhipa

text.ascii: yady ahaM dvArakAyAM syAM rAjan saMnihitaH purA
text.ur: yady ahaṁ dvārakāyāṁ syāṁ rājan saṁnihitaḥ purā

text.ascii: Agaccheyam ahaM dyUtam anAhUto 'pi kauravaiH
text.ur: āgaccheyam ahaṁ dyūtam anāhūto ’pi kauravaiḥ

text.ascii: Ambikeyena durdharSa rAjJA duryodhanena ca
text.ur: āmbikeyena durdharṣa rājñā duryodhanena ca

text.ascii: vArayeyam ahaM dyUtaM bahUn doSAn pradarzayan
text.ur: vārayeyam ahaṁ dyūtaṁ bahūn doṣān pradarśayan

text.ascii: bhISmadroNau samAnAyya kRpaM bAhlIkam eva ca
text.ur: bhīṣmadroṇau samānāyya kr̥paṁ bāhlīkam eva ca

text.ascii: vaicitravIryaM rAjAnam alaM dyUtena kaurava
text.ur: vaicitravīryaṁ rājānam alaṁ dyūtena kaurava

text.ascii: putrANAM tava rAjendra tvannimittam iti prabho
text.ur: putrāṇāṁ tava rājendra tvannimittam iti prabho

text.ascii: tatra vakSyAmy ahaM doSAn yair bhavAn avaropitaH
text.ur: tatra vakṣyāmy ahaṁ doṣān yair bhavān avaropitaḥ

text.ascii: vIrasenasuto yaiz ca rAjyAt prabhraMzitaH purA
text.ur: vīrasenasuto yaiś ca rājyāt prabhraṁśitaḥ purā

text.ascii: abhakSitavinAzaM ca devanena vizAM pate
text.ur: abhakṣitavināśaṁ ca devanena viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: sAtatyaM ca prasaGgasya varNayeyaM yathAtatham
text.ur: sātatyaṁ ca prasaṅgasya varṇayeyaṁ yathātatham

text.ascii: striyo 'kSA mRgayA pAnam etat kAmasamutthitam
text.ur: striyo ’kṣā mr̥gayā pānam etat kāmasamutthitam

text.ascii: vyasanaM catuSTayaM proktaM yai rAjan bhrazyate zriyaH
text.ud: व्यसनं चतुष्टयं प्रोक्तं यै राजन्भ्रश्यते श्रियः
text.ur: vyasanaṁ catuṣṭayaṁ proktaṁ yai rājan bhraśyate śriyaḥ

text.ascii: tatra sarvatra vaktavyaM manyante zAstrakovidAH
text.ur: tatra sarvatra vaktavyaṁ manyante śāstrakovidāḥ

text.ascii: vizeSataz ca vaktavyaM dyUte pazyanti tadvidaH
text.ur: viśeṣataś ca vaktavyaṁ dyūte paśyanti tadvidaḥ

text.ascii: ekAhnA dravyanAzo 'tra dhruvaM vyasanam eva ca
text.ur: ekāhnā dravyanāśo ’tra dhruvaṁ vyasanam eva ca

text.ascii: abhuktanAzaz cArthAnAM vAkpAruSyaM ca kevalam
text.ur: abhuktanāśaś cārthānāṁ vākpāruṣyaṁ ca kevalam

text.ascii: etac cAnyac ca kauravya prasaGgi kaTukodayam
text.ur: etac cānyac ca kauravya prasaṅgi kaṭukodayam

text.ascii: dyUte brUyAM mahAbAho samAsAdyAmbikAsutam
text.ur: dyūte brūyāṁ mahābāho samāsādyāmbikāsutam

text.ascii: evam ukto yadi mayA gRhNIyAd vacanaM mama
text.ur: evam ukto yadi mayā gr̥hṇīyād vacanaṁ mama

text.ascii: anAmayaM syAd dharmasya kurUNAM kurunandana
text.ur: anāmayaṁ syād dharmasya kurūṇāṁ kurunandana

text.ascii: na cet sa mama rAjendra gRhNIyAn madhuraM vacaH
text.ud: न चेत्स मम राजेन्द्र गृह्णीयान्मधुरं वचः
text.ur: na cet sa mama rājendra gr̥hṇīyān madhuraṁ vacaḥ

text.ascii: pathyaM ca bharatazreSTha nigRhNIyAM balena tam
text.ud: पथ्यं च भरतश्रेष्ठ निगृह्णीयां बलेन तम्
text.ur: pathyaṁ ca bharataśreṣṭha nigr̥hṇīyāṁ balena tam

text.ascii: athainAn abhinIyaivaM suhRdo nAma durhRdaH
text.ur: athainān abhinīyaivaṁ suhr̥do nāma durhr̥daḥ

text.ascii: sabhAsadaz ca tAn sarvAn bhedayeyaM durodarAn
text.ur: sabhāsadaś ca tān sarvān bhedayeyaṁ durodarān

text.ascii: asAMnidhyaM tu kauravya mamAnarteSv abhUt tadA
text.ur: asāṁnidhyaṁ tu kauravya mamānarteṣv abhūt tadā

text.ascii: yenedaM vyasanaM prAptA bhavanto dyUtakAritam
text.ur: yenedaṁ vyasanaṁ prāptā bhavanto dyūtakāritam

text.ascii: so 'ham etya kuruzreSTha dvArakAM pANDunandana
text.ur: so ’ham etya kuruśreṣṭha dvārakāṁ pāṇḍunandana

text.ascii: azrauSaM tvAM vyasaninaM yuyudhAnAd yathAtatham
text.ur: aśrauṣaṁ tvāṁ vyasaninaṁ yuyudhānād yathātatham

text.ascii: zrutvaiva cAhaM rAjendra paramodvignamAnasaH
text.ur: śrutvaiva cāhaṁ rājendra paramodvignamānasaḥ

text.ascii: tUrNam abhyAgato 'smi tvAM draSTukAmo vizAM pate
text.ur: tūrṇam abhyāgato ’smi tvāṁ draṣṭukāmo viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: aho kRcchram anuprAptAH sarve sma bharatarSabha
text.ur: aho kr̥cchram anuprāptāḥ sarve sma bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: ye vayaM tvAM vyasaninaM pazyAmaH saha sodaraiH
text.ud: ये वयं त्वां व्यसनिनं पश्यामः सह सोदरैः
text.ur: ye vayaṁ tvāṁ vyasaninaṁ paśyāmaḥ saha sodaraiḥ
